titlepage.titleproper: Register of the Eric Cyril Bellquist Papers, 1928-1979
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California
titlepage.p: © 1997 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Descriptive Summary

physdesc.label: Extent
physdesc.extent: 66 manuscript boxes, 1 oversize box, 2 card file boxes, 9 envelopes, 2 phonotape reels, 3 phonorecords, 1 motion picture film reel.

did.abstract: Correspondence, reports, memoranda, writings, press releases, printed matter, and audiovisual material, relating to American propaganda activities during and after World War II; postwar American foreign policy, especially in Scandinavia; political conditions in the United States, Sweden, and elsewhere in Europe; and public opinion formation.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Eric Cyril Bellquist papers, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1981.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog Socrates at http://library.stanford.edu/webcat. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in Socrates is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

scopecontent.p: Notes, correspondence, and writings arranged by physical form

did.unittitle: OFFICE OF WAR INFORMATION, 1943 MAY-1945 SEPTEMBER 15

scopecontent.p: Articles, booklets, cables and dispatches, flyers, magazines, memoranda, newsletters, notes, pamphlets, printed matter, reports, and telegrams arranged chronologically by year
Memoranda, press releases, printed matter, and reports arranged by physical form and subject

did.unittitle: OFFICE OF INTERNATIONAL INFORMATION AND CULTURAL AFFAIRS (OIC), 1946 JANUARY-AUGUST AND 1949 AUGUST

scopecontent.p: Printed matter, telegrams, press releases, memoranda, newsletters, notes, reports, correspondence arranged chronologically by year. Includes some materials between 1946 August and 1949 August relating to the activities of the OIC

did.unittitle: PUBLIC AFFAIRS OFFICER, UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF STATE, 1949-1951 AUGUST

scopecontent.p: Printed matter, reports, pamphlets, magazines, telegrams, newsletters arranged alphabetically by subject. Includes some materials from 1951 August to 1953 relating to Bellquist's activities as a Public Affairs Officer
Printed matter, press releases, articles, reports, notes, newsletters, pamphlets, memoranda, cables and dispatches, speeches and statements, and fliers arranged alphabetically by subject
Two scrapbooks, one hand drawn political cartoon, and Office of War Information organizational charts
Bibliographic files arranged alphabetically by author

physdesc.extent: 2 discs, with one a copy of the other

did.unittitle: "The Living Stream," 16mm film, 1951 January 23 and February 10
129 prints depicting West German Bundestag members visiting the United States,

scopecontent.p: Includes 1 print of Elmer Davis, 1 print of Sumner Wells, 1 print of Polish farmers, and 1 print of the United States Information Service organizational chart.

did.unittitle: 7 prints depicting a campaign promotion in California,

scopecontent.p: Includes 9 prints of the 1948 elections, 10 prints of King Gustavus V, 9 prints of the Swedish Parliament, 9 prints of the Swedish Military, and 3 prints of political cartoons.
Includes 1 print of King Haakon VII, and 1 print of President Carl Hambro of the Norwegian Parliament.

Includes 4 prints of the Danish Parliament, 3 prints of elections, 3 prints of the Danish Military, 2 prints of Foreign Minister Peter Munch, 2 prints of Prime Minister Theodore Stauning, 1 print of Nazi leader Fritz Clausen, and 1 print of commanding Officer General von Kaupisch.
Includes 2 prints of Field Marshall Karl Mannerheim, 1 print of President Lauri Relander, 1 print of President Risto Ryti, 1 print of Foreign Minister Erkko, and 1 print of the Finnish Parliament.

did.unittitle: 2 prints depicting the League of Nations

scopecontent.p: Includes 2 prints of the League of Nations, 1 print of President Lauri Relander, 1 print of the Norwegian Parliament, and 1 print of Danish government officials.
